description.value: You rush forward. Stride up to five times, or up to eight times if you used 3 actions. All this movement must be in a straight line (though the GM might allow reasonable variance). You can replace any of these Strides with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] action if you need to, which you attempt using an Athletics check instead of an Acrobatics check, using the same DC.
